scripts.create-test-image:build-only: kie-tools--image-builder build -r "$(pnpm build-env devDeploymentFormWebappImage.registry)" -a "$(pnpm build-env devDeploymentFormWebappImage.account)" -n "$(pnpm build-env devDeploymentFormWebappImage.name)" -t "$(pnpm build-env devDeploymentFormWebappImage.tags)"

scripts.create-test-image:minikube: kie-tools--image-builder minikube -r "$(pnpm build-env devDeploymentFormWebappImage.registry)" -a "$(pnpm build-env devDeploymentFormWebappImage.account)" -n "$(pnpm build-env devDeploymentFormWebappImage.name)" -t "$(pnpm build-env devDeploymentFormWebappImage.tags)"
scripts.create-test-image:openshift: kie-tools--image-builder openshift -r "$(pnpm build-env devDeploymentFormWebappImage.registry)" -a "$(pnpm build-env devDeploymentFormWebappImage.account)" -n "$(pnpm build-env devDeploymentFormWebappImage.name)" -t "$(pnpm build-env devDeploymentFormWebappImage.tags)"
scripts.image:docker:build: kie-tools--image-builder build -r "$(pnpm build-env devDeploymentFormWebappImage.registry)" -a "$(pnpm build-env devDeploymentFormWebappImage.account)" -n "$(pnpm build-env devDeploymentFormWebappImage.name)" -t "$(pnpm build-env devDeploymentFormWebappImage.tags)" -p
scripts.image:podman:build: kie-tools--image-builder build -r "$(pnpm build-env devDeploymentFormWebappImage.registry)" -a "$(pnpm build-env devDeploymentFormWebappImage.account)" -n "$(pnpm build-env devDeploymentFormWebappImage.name)" -t "$(pnpm build-env devDeploymentFormWebappImage.tags)" -e podman
